about.bio: A dedicated Front-end Developer Based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia
about.desc: I am a self-taught web developer proficient in creating responsive websites. My creativity is reflected in aesthetically pleasing designs, while my passion for learning and quick adaptability allows me to stay abreast of technological developments. I have expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Bootstrap, Sass, Figma and Git, enhancing my ability to deliver comprehensive and visually appealing web solutions.

project.name: Cozy Havens
project.desc: Cozy Havens website is an online platform that allow users to rent accommodation, offering a user-friendly interface to discover, compare, and reserve accommodations in Yogyakarta.
